20110111084024.000|20110111084024.000|CC1|          rest is here,         
20110111084024.000|20110111084028.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20110111084028.000|20110111084028.000|CC1|  Lunesta helps you fall asleep 
20110111084028.000|20110111084031.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20110111084031.000|20110111084031.000|CC1|           so you can           
20110111084031.000|20110111084033.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20110111084033.000|20110111084033.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20110111084033.000|20110111084036.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20110111084036.000|20110111084038.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20110111084038.000|20110111084038.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20110111084038.000|20110111084041.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20110111084041.000|20110111084041.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20110111084041.000|20110111084043.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20110111084043.000|20110111084045.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20110111084045.000|20110111084045.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20110111084045.000|20110111084047.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20110111084047.000|20110111084049.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20110111084049.000|20110111084049.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20110111084049.000|20110111084051.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20110111084051.000|20110111084051.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20110111084051.000|20110111084053.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20110111084053.000|20110111084053.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20110111084053.000|20110111084055.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20110111084055.000|20110111084055.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20110111084055.000|20110111084057.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20110111084057.000|20110111084059.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20110111084059.000|20110111084059.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20110111084059.000|20110111084102.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20110111084102.000|20110111084102.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20110111084102.000|20110111084104.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.    
20110111084104.000|20110111084104.000|CC1|   Ask your doctor if Lunesta
